data.title: University of Toronto
data.meta_description: At the University of Toronto, students, faculty and staff study, work and live on three campuses: St. George, Mississauga and Scarborough.
data.text:
At the University of Toronto, our students, faculty and staff study, work and live on three campuses, and we are all part of one university community.

With some of the most prestigious architecture and beautiful green space in the Greater Toronto Area (GTA), U of T offers an extraordinary backdrop to learn, work, and thrive. We are situated in one of the world's most vibrant urban environments. Ranked the most diverse city in North America, Toronto and the surrounding GTA are dynamic, inviting cities, with something for everyone. From sports teams to cultural happenings, festivals to street fairs, Toronto has it all.

Students can choose to study at one of the three vibrant campuses â€“ St. George (downtown Toronto), Mississauga and Scarborough.
